text: Ara mumina nariderake baluna, tara yena tadera drstike sanyata kare [1] ebam tadera lajjasthanera hephayata kare [2]; ara tara yena tadera saundarya [3] pradarsana na kare tabe ya sadharanata prakasa haye thake [4]. Ara tara tadera gala o buka yena mathara kapara dbara dheke rakhe [5]. Ara tara yena tadera sbami, pita, sbasura, putra, sbamira putra, bha'i, bha'iyera chele, bonera chele, apana narira [6], tadera malikanadhina dasi, purusadera madhye yauna kamana- rahita purusa [7] ebam naridera gopana anga sambandhe ajna balaka [8] chara karo kache tadera saundarya prakasa na kare, tara yena tadera gopana saundarya prakasera uddesye sajore padacarana na kare [9].
